d1e3.d: Little Red Riding. hood finds out that it is not her Grandmother but it is the wolf.

d1e10.d: Little Red's mother makes sure she is prepared to go into the forest and warns her to be careful in the woods.

d1e24.d: Red riding hood sets out to make a basket of food for her grandmother. Then sets off to her grandmothers house.

d1e31.d: Little Red Riding Hood finally makes it to her Grandmothers house. She shows what he brought her. But her Grandmother doesn't look right.

d1e39.d: Little Red goes into the woods with her basket to Grandmothers house and meets a wolf along the way.
